amendment.description: Amendment provides for the establishment of National and Regional Gang Activity Databases.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 109-76 to establish funding for regional databases that track gang activity in high intensity gang areas.

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. E. B. Johnson.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson, E. B. amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
